Package Interfaces

Interface INotifyValidationChanged

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChatTabPageView, LoginTabPageView, MainWindowView, SettingsTabPageView, ViewBase
public interface INotifyValidationChanged
The INotifyValidationChanged interface provides a standard mechanism for objects to notify listeners that a validation status has changed.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onValidationChanged(Object sender, ValidationChangedEventArgs e)
    Notifies listeners that a validation status has changed.

  • Method Details

    • onValidationChanged

      void onValidationChanged(Object sender, ValidationChangedEventArgs e)
      Notifies listeners that a validation status has changed.
      Parameters:
      sender - The object raising the validation change event.
      e - The event arguments containing information about the validation change.
